check.name: MetadataIdentifierPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Metadata Identifier concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept MetadataIdentifier is present."
if(MetadataIdentifier is not None and len(str(MetadataIdentifier)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "MetadataIdentifier concept is not present"
return False

dialect.name: ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata (CSDGM) Biological Data Profile

check.name: KeywordPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Keyword concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept Keyword is present."
if(Keyword is not None and len(str(Keyword)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "Keyword concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: Keyword
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='theme']/keyword//*) or (/metadata/simpleDc/subject) or (/*/subject) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'project')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'theme')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'place')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'platform')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'dataCent')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'discipline')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'stratum')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'temporal')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'featureType')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'process')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'product')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'dataResolution')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'service')) and not(contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'instrument'))]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'project')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'theme')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'place')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'platform')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'dataCent')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'discipline')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'stratum')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'temporal')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'featureType')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'process')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'product')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'dataResolution')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'service')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'instrument')]/keyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/CategoryKeyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/TopicKeyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/TermKeyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/VariableLevel1Keyword/Value) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/VariableLevel1Keyword/VariableLevel2Keyword/Value) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/VariableLevel1Keyword/VariableLevel2Keyword/VariableLevel3Keyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword/DetailedVariableKeyword) or (/*/ScienceKeywords/ScienceKeyword//*) or (/DIF/Keyword) or (/DIF/AncillaryKeyword) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='place']/keyword//*) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/extent/EX_Extent/geographicElement/EX_GeographicDescription/geographicIdentifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/*/Spatial/GranuleLocality/LocalityValue) or (/*/SpatialKeywords/Keyword) or (/DIF/Location/Location_Category) or (/DIF/Location/Location_Type) or (/DIF/Location/Location_Subregion1) or (/DIF/Location/Location_Subregion2) or (/DIF/Location/Location_Subregion3) or (/DIF/Location/Detailed_Location) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='instrument']/keyword//*) or (/*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/ShortName) or (/*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/LongName) or (/DIF/Sensor_Name/Short_Name) or (/DIF/Sensor_Name/Long_Name) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='platform']/keyword//*) or (//Platforms/Platform/ShortName) or (//Platforms/Platform/LongName) or (/DIF/Source_Name/Short_Name) or (/DIF/Source_Name/Long_Name) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='project']/keyword//*) or (/*/Campaigns/Campaign/ShortName) or (/*/Campaigns/Campaign/LongName) or (/DIF/Project/Short_Name) or (/DIF/Project/Short_Name) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/theme/themekey) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/place/placekey) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[not(contains(@keywordType,'place')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'place')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'thematic')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'temporal')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'discipline')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'stratum')) and not(contains(@keywordType,'taxonomic'))]) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='place']) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='taxonomic']) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='thematic']) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='temporal']) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='discipline']) or (/eml/*/keywordSet/keyword[@keywordType='stratu']) or (/resource/subjects/subject) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/theme/themekey) or (/metadata/mercury/Parameter_Description/Sensor) or (/metadata/mercury/Parameter_Description/Source) or (/metadata/mercury/Parameter_Description/Term) or (/metadata/mercury/Parameter_Description/Topic) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/place/placekey) or (/metadata/mercury/Site_Information/Site) or (/metadata/mercury/Keywords) or (/metadata/mercury/Parameter_Description/Parameter) or (/metadata/mercury/Navpath) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/theme/themekey) or (/metadata/idinfo/keywords/place/placekey)
